name: imaginetheending
description: A development skeleton for a private website.

scripts.dist: mkdir -p dist/js dist/css; cp src/html/index.html dist/; cp -r src/html/templates dist/; cp -r static/* dist/; uglifyjs src/js/app.js src/js/app-controllers.js src/js/app-services.js  --compress --mangle --comments -o dist/js/app.min.js; lessc src/less/main.less --clean-css="--s1" > dist/css/main.min.css
